# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color to display behind the preview.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Configuring the preview attributes

- **visiblePath**: The portion of the view to show in the preview.
- **shadowPath**: The path to use for drawing the preview’s shadow.
